## sdf_num_partitions

## Description
Gets number of partitions of a Spark DataFrame


## Usage
```r
sdf_num_partitions(x)
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| x | A `spark_connection`, `ml_pipeline`, or a `tbl_spark`. |
